Oyiri Oyibo bụ ọrụ nchọpụta plagiarism n'ịntanetị na-enyocha ma ọdịnaya ederede yiri ya ọ pụtara ebe ọzọ na webụ
Ewepụtara ya na 2004 site na Indigo Stream Technologies, Ltd.
Ndị nwe ọdịnaya na-eji Copyscape chọpụta ikpe nke "izu ohi ọdịnaya", nke a na-e copyomi ọdịnaya na-enweghị ikike site n'otu saịtị gaa na nke ọzọ
Ndị na-ebipụta ọdịnaya na-ejikwa ya iji chọpụta ikpe nke wayo ọdịnaya, ebe a na-akwakọghachi ọdịnaya ochie wee ree ya dị ka ọdịnaya izizi ọhụrụ.

A malitere Copyscape na 2004 site na Indigo Stream Technologies, Ltd., nke Gideon Greenspan hiwere na 2003. Dị ka ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Greenspan si kwuo, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mepụtara ọrụ ịdọ aka ná ntị a na-akpọ Google Alert, nke ọrụ Copyscape toro dị ka mmụba.
Nyere URL ma ọ bụ ederede nke ọdịnaya izizi, Copyscape weghachite ndepụta ibe weebụ nwere ederede yiri ya na ọdịnaya niile ma ọ bụ akụkụ nke ọdịnaya a
Ọ na-egosikwa ederede dakọtara agbanyere na ibe weebụ achọtara
Enwere ike idowe ọkọlọtọ Copyscape na ibe weebụ iji dọọ ndị na-eme ihe ike aka na ntị ka ha ghara izu ohi ọdịnaya
Copysentry na-enyocha webụ ma na-eziga ọkwa site na email mgbe achọtara mbipụta ọhụrụ, yana Copyscape Premium na-enyocha mmalite nke ọdịnaya nke ndị mbipụta ọdịnaya n'ịntanetị zụtara.
Copyscape na-eji Google Weebụ API mee ka nchọta ya dị ike
Copyscape na-eji usoro algọridim iji chọpụta ọdịnaya e depụtaghachiri emezigharị site na ụdị mbụ ya
A kọpụtala iji Copyscape mee ihe n'okwu metụtara mpụ n'ịntanetị:
